snippet.title: Magicka: Wizard Wars Announcement Teaser GDC 2013
snippet.description:
Learn more about Magicka Wizard Wars here: http://bit.ly/YPiiA2

In typical fashion for Magicka's live-action trailers, Paradox announced Magicka Wizard Wars with their most epic trailer yet.  In it, Red, Green, Brown and Yellow trek across the tundra on their way to a feast when they are alarmed by the all-important Aldrhorn before being separated from one another.

Magicka: Wizard Wars, a player-versus-player (PvP)-focused multiplayer game based on their celebrated slapstick sorcery franchise. Magicka: Wizard Wars, a team-based, fast-paced, two-faced, post-haste, four-on-four twitch action-PvP title, mixes Magicka's hallmark dynamic spellcasting and absurd pop-culture humor with new hardcore game mechanics and a focus on competitive play.
